title: SITDAO
author: SITDAO
content: Announcement: Private Seed Round for SITDAO!Greetings, fellow crypto enthusiasts!We're thrilled to unveil the launch of our exclusive Private Seed Round for SITDAO - the Social Interaction Token Decentralized Autonomous Organization!What is SITDAO?SITDAO is not just another token—it's a pioneering concept aimed at revolutionizing social interactions within the crypto sphere. Our platform is set to redefine how token developers engage with their communities, offering a unique avenue for genuine interaction and effective promotion.GITBOOK - https://sitdao.gitbook.io/sitdao/Private Seed Round Details:In this unprecedented seed round, we're seeking a compact team of 10-15 dynamic individuals—innovators, strategists, and visionaries—who share our commitment to building a robust and sustainable platform.Why a Compact Team?We value quality over quantity. A smaller, agile team ensures each member's role is pivotal without dilution, fostering a cohesive environment for impactful contributions.Our Mission:We've witnessed the pitfalls of failed presales due to the absence of a solid core team. With SITDAO, we're determined to chart a different course—embarking on a journey where each team member's input shapes the project's success.Product Description:SITDAO introduces a platform that empowers token developers, providing them with a streamlined mechanism for airdrops and launches. Our system rewards users based on genuine social interactions, ensuring a vibrant and engaged community.Join us in this exceptional venture where collaboration meets innovation. Let's craft the future of social interaction within the crypto landscape together!How to Get Involved:If you're a forward-thinker, an enthusiast, or a professional seeking to be part of an avant-garde project, drop a message below or DM us for more details on how you can join the SITDAO Private Seed Round!Telegram - https://t.me/palmtree777xLet's create something extraordinary!

comments.author: SITDAO
comments.body: ReservedThis thread is for the public record, that private seed round happened.
